New Records: Sunil Chhetri became the first player to have found the net in his first, 25th, 50th, 75th, 100th, 125th, and 150th matches
Key Match Events: Afghanistan scored twice in the 70th and 88th minute to win 2-1
India conceded a penalty in the 88th minute due to a communications failure between the goalkeeper and defender
Afghanistan's Sharif Mukhammad scored a goal in the 88th minute to seal the win
Pre-Game Insights: India needed to avoid defeat against Kuwait in Kolkata in June to stay on course for a berth in the third round of the 2026 World Cup qualifiers
Afghanistan had no clubs for four of their players on the pitch and one on the bench
Post-Match Reflections: Sunil Chhetri said India lacked control and conceded silly goals
Coach Igor Stimac stated that India's passing and ball control showed where they stand
India remained second in group A of the 2026 World Cup qualifiers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan had 5 shots on target to India's 1
India's goal came against the run of play in the 38th minute
Others: India's 150th match was marked by a loss, with Chhetri scoring in the 38th minute but Afghanistan coming back to win 2-1
